predicate.note: Frames file for 'knead' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 26.5, Framenet entry Manipulation.

roleset.name: form dough into a loaf

example.name: not bread, but still yummy
example.text: Nearby, five temporary residents of the school shelter sit on stools, having their necks and backs kneaded by volunteer masseuses.

example.name: only bread takes arg2
example.text: John kneaded the dough into a loaf.

roleset.note: That last example sounds weird even to me.
